example:
User Prompt:

Explain how I can find the highest number in an array with JavaScript

AI-Generated Response:

To calculate the maximum number in an array in JavaScript, you can use the Math.max method along with the spread operator (...).
const numbers = [1, 5, 2, 10, 8];
const maxNumber = Math.max(...numbers);
In this example, we have an array of numbers [1, 5, 2, 10, 8]. By using Math.max and spreading the numbers array using the spread operator (...), we can find the maximum number in the array. The result will be stored in the maxNumber variable. In this case, maxNumber will be 10.

disclaimer:
While I've streamlined the process to make getting coding assistance fast (by selecting one of the predefined options) - there are still some important limitations to be aware of:

  • ● Character Limit: The AI chat has a maximum capacity of 700 characters per submission. I advise you to select your words carefully to make the most of this limit.
  • ● Handling Complex Issues: For more intricate coding challenges, I recommend dividing your code into smaller segments and interacting with the chat step by step. Alternatively, you may choose to use ChatGPT directly for more extensive assistance.
  • ● Adherence to Guidelines: For an optimal experience, please ensure you follow the specific guidelines provided for each assistance option.
  • ● Limited testing: The chat has only been manually tested with popular languages (e.g. JavaScript, CSS/SASS, Typescript, Python, Java, Lua) and some random ones like COBOL and Haskell. It has worked as expected (so far).

By understanding and working within these parameters, you'll achieve the best results from this simple AI coding assistant. Happy coding!
features:
Currently supported by this application:

  • → Diverse prompt options to streamline code assistance process
  • → Built-in commands in the chat system for additional guidance
  • → ChatGPT AI model utilized
  • → Hassle-free code submission with automatic encoding before sent to API for response
  • → Prism.js syntax highlighting for all the popular languages
  • → Personalized experience by utilizing localStorage to save chat history and additional user preferences
  • → Download chat history to an HTML file that is formatted for printing
  • → Progressive Web App (PWA) to use as a native application
  • → Response time calculated to keep track of AI response performance
  • → Responsive on all devices screens
  • → Light & dark mode
  • → Convenient toolbar for quick copying, saving, deleting, and downloading
For a full breakdown of features, check out the project's README file.
